entry.title: Inside Gaza, People Desperately Seek Safety
entry.content: An evacuation warning from the Israeli military sowed panic in the sealed-off Palestinian enclave.

entry.title: U.S. Push to Evacuate Americans from Gaza Falters Amid Egyptian Demands
entry.content: Egypt wants a deal for aid to Gaza before allowing foreigners to exit, officials say. Meanwhile, Palestinians are offered temporary travel corridor to southern Gaza.

entry.title: Israel Aims to Destroy Hamas. What Comes Next for Gaza Is Unclear.
entry.content: Israel is preparing a ground invasion of the Gaza Strip to destroy Hamas. But it hasn’t offered any indication of what could happen next.

entry.title: Americans Send Help to Israel, Including Supplies That Range From Baby Formula to Tactical Gear
entry.content: Americans are raising millions of dollars and organizing grassroots campaigns to provide flights, medical supplies and other aid to Israel, while efforts to get aid to civilians trapped inside Gaza are being stymied by Israel’s blockade.
